update.description:
Fix transparent web proxy. Fix URL filter timeconstraints.
Language updates.
Upgrade acpid to 2.0.21, dhcpcd to 6.2.1, grep to 2.18, iptables to 1.4.21, iw to 3.14, libcap to 2.24, libpcap to 1.5.3, squid to 3.3.11, tar to 1.27.1, tcpdump to 4.5.1, tzdata to 2013i, vim to 7.4, wget to 1.5, xz to 5.0.5.
